words.def: a category of things distinguished by some common characteristic or quality
a couple who both have careers and no children (an acronym for dual income no kids)
a young person of either sex
a liquid used for printing or writing or drawing
a person having kinship with another or others
a loud harsh or strident noise
Ti, a plant native to the Pacific islands and China, Cordyline fruticosa.
a state in the Rocky Mountains
a unit of length equal to one twelfth of a foot
